title: Opinion: Ben O’Connor’s Reign in Red Looks Doomed. It’s Podium or Bust for the Vuelta a España Leader
content:
Jeremy Whittle assesses how Decathlon-Ag2r La Mondiale needs to weigh the risk and reward of O’Connor racing for a career-first grand tour podium.

Read the full article at Opinion: Ben O’Connor’s Reign in Red Looks Doomed. It’s Podium or Bust for the Vuelta a España Leader on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
